name: Warcos
storyline:
The gameplay revolves around the cartel protecting their drugs in their drug lab from being destroyed or
confiscated by the opposing SWAT team in the Forest Lab map, and the cartel attacking the SWAT team
that destroyed or confiscated the drugs in the Desert Military Base map. Each player will choose which
side he wants to play on as well as the weapons in their arsenal. The current amount of weapons in the
game is limited to 1 sniper, 1 machine gun, 1 sub-machine gun, 1 shotgun, and 2 pistols. You will rely on
your own skill in-game to win matches and make in-game money to purchase unique character and
weapon skins that were created from scratch by our developers.
summary:
Warcos is an excellent real-time tactical command shooter game. Choose whom you want to be a SWAT soldier or Cartel member. Win fights, eliminate opponents, earn game money, increase your level and customize your equipment.
Play online with thousands of players in this multiplayer first-person shooter game as a solo or together with friends.
Plunge into the world of battles and victories. Assemble your team and fight till the end. Enjoy the game and improve your skills.
